name: Robinson Technologies Texture File
summary: An RTTEX file is a texture file saved in the Robinson Technologies Texture (RTTEX) format. It is used by Growtopia, a game that allows you to build worlds, compose music, choose an occupation, trade items, and earn achievements. RTTEX files store one or more textures for gameplay elements, such as characters, items, and landscape.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
